itemInfo.itemDesc: Timber required for Construction.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Logs received from trees Lumbered in any region.

item.name: Log
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Lumbering trees grown in every region.

item.name: Advanced Cooking Utensil
item.desc: A high-quality tool used when cooking.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.name: Advanced Alchemy Tool
item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.name: Ship License: Fishing Boat
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Fishing Boat> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 12, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
